website_summaries.verdict: Sturdily designed, ultra-soft, and all-around adorable, this perfectly-sized Snoopy plush is an excellent present for a baby or toddler.
cons: Snoopy’s ear and body fur are different textures

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: The beagles love their snoopy friend. They must know Snoopy is a beagle because they snuggle with him instead of tear him up. He's soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA G.

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Snoopy for my first grandson who will arrive any day now, but he will not be receiving this Snoopy. It doesn't look any thing like the picture. The eyes are very small, almost non-existent. The worst thing is that they are to even! One is high and the other is low. Scary looking. As I said, this was a great disappointment, but not worth returning. May the dog will enjoy playing with it. I would definitely no recommend this Snoopy to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Snoopy loving adult too!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had been in the hospital and has always loved Snoopy. Since I couldn't be there every night I wanted to get him something to remind him of me in the hard times during the day and at night. It did just the trick! This Snoopy is so soft and cozy, and incredibly warm. It absolutely put a smile on his face, and though he least expected it, he has said holding it tight got him through some of his worst nights.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very plushy, very cute. Cons: doesn't cuddle me back
customer_reviews.author: S. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description and reviews.
customer_reviews.text: My son had wanted a stuffed Snoopy for a while and I was thrilled to find one that seemed to be of such a high quality. But I was disappointed in the size of the doll, as well as its more coarse texture. I feel that my son will like him, but I would have preferred something softer and more plush. I feel that the reviews and the product description were misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: So great I had to buy a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Snoopy because of the great reviews and got some Peanuts kids' books to go with it. Well, my 2-year-old decided that Snoopy was hers only so I had to buy another one for my son! I love his fur and the contrasting fabric for his ears and nose. He doesn't sit up by himself, he's a little top heavy but that's not a big deal to my kids. If you're looking for a good cuddle buddy for your kids (or yourself) I would highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Nanners1010

customer_reviews.title: Lambs & Ivy Snoopy Plush brings back memories of yesteryear...
customer_reviews.text: Snoopy Plush is a winner and is soft and cuddly. I mailed Snoopy to South Dakota for a Christmas Present. I'm sure he was a winner there, too. I hope Snoopy becomes a favorite as he was to the babies deceased grandfather. No regrets with the purchase. Everyone should purchase Lambs & Ivy Snoopy Plush because it places a big smile on your face. It also brings back memories of yesteryear.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Soft...fuzzy....Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my Snoopy collection. He’s very soft and well made. I have a WWI Flying Ace outfit I saved from a very old Snoopy and I was thrilled to discover it fits this one perfectly. You don’t have to be a youngster to love Snoopy.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Field

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Snoopy Doll
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife bcause she absolutely loves Snoopy! The photos of Snoopy on the Amazon website looked really cute and well made, which turned out to be very true. If you love Snoopy too, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy is so soft!
customer_reviews.text: This Snoopy is so soft! I like the texture on his ears and the spot on his back!
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Sadly slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love, love Snoopy and was a little disappointed in this plush. It is rather stiff and squishable. This plush in the picture to me looked floppy and extremely soft but it’s not. It has beans in its bottom so it does sit up nicely to pose, but I thought it would be completely different. Also seems smaller. Its head seems disproportionated making it a lesser cute Snoopy :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Soft and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Snoopy collection last year, and now I'm buying another one to put in my Operation Christmas Child gift box. This Snoopy is so soft and cuddly. Perfect for all ages. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ncgrl

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuffy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Snoopy for my son's 2nd birthday! He LOVES it! Sleeps with him every night since.
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Paley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as soft and squishy as I thought it would be. The white part of the fur is soft but the black areas are a little rough. It’s not as squishy and huggable, but instead It’s more firm, easily sits up, and doesn’t fall over. I also thought it would be a little smaller than it actually is. Not what I was expecting, but as a snoopy plush collector, it’s a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, high quality Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: So soft, very high quality, great size, love the two textures of fur! My only disappointment, if I had to pick one, is my three-year-old son, to whom this was gifted upon completion of potty training, noticed Snoopy lacks a smile. Otherwise, he’s totally perfect! Highly recommend this Snoopy!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Snoopy as a gift to my sister, who absolutely loves him. He is so very soft and just adorable. He has become her constant companion in her new SUV. Her rule is that anyone not willing to hold Snoopy in the front seat has to sit in the back (not kidding!). Definitely one of the better gifts I've given her in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, cuddly and cute! Everyone loves Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Snoopy?!?! He was a special Christmas present and a big hit! Wanted to keep him for myself :o)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The description says sits at 10.5 inches tall so I expected him to be bigger. Top to toe, all stretched out he's only 12.25 inches. His fur is super soft, his ears a little less. He's very cute and will make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cute, good quality. My niece loves to chew on the ear :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: SNOOPY
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT SIZE TO GO WITH OUR 4 MONTH OLD SONS CHARLIE BROWN COSTUME
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gotreaux

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: Item came sooner than anticipated and all in perfect order. This Snoopy is going to look so cute with the Woodstock that we ordered! We cannot wait to set this up in our son's nursery! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: M5eickhoff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Plush Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: Super plush Snoopy that is durable quality. I purchased this snoopy for a Halloween theme I was doing and had him sitting on top of his dog house. It was adorable and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Snoopy fan, and a stuffed animal fan, so this helped in both categories. He sits atop a pillow in my apartment and greets everyone who happens by. He is snuggly and fun to look at as well as cuddle. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's birthday. He absolutely loves it. It is soft, durable, and a great quality for the price paid. It seems like it will be fairly easy to clean. The varying textures- one for the ears and one for the fur- are very nice and durable. So grateful for this Snoopy.
customer_reviews.author: Annalee Bond

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: So soft! Bought for my youngest grandson who is 1.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: I got my daughter this because I had one as a child and it’s falling a part and it was my one and everything. So now my daughter got one and it is now her one and everything. Soft, cute and has fluffy ears.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Good doggie
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and my friend loved it!
customer_reviews.author: QQ

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE, SOFT And PLUSH!
customer_reviews.text: Adorably sweet. Very soft and plush. Perfect gift for a toddler, child or even an adult! Just the right size. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Snoopy! Very soft, perfect huggable size for my 2 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with the whole Peanuts crew and she just LOVES this. It’s SO plush and soft. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my toddler who was Charlie Brown for Halloween. He absolutely loves his Snoopy and takes it to his bed every night. It's soft, cuddly and adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: Love Snoopy. Bought for myself. Sharing with grandkids. They love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not made well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my daughter’s first Snoopy. Arrived quickly. Super cute and super soft. She loved it immediately and then tried to eat it. The fur on it comes off easily so definitely not appropriate for a baby without careful supervision. A week after we bought it had a giant hole in it. It’s cute for a shelf, but that’s about it. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Miller

customer_reviews.title: Totally amazing; very happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn niece and almost kept it for myself. This little guy is so soft it makes you want to cry. Totally amazing; very happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McMullen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother and she absolutely loved it. It is so soft and adorable. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy is a dear companion for my 4 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his Snoopy plush. He takes it everywhere it is allowed to go.
customer_reviews.author: SSSE

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: This Snoopy is so soft! I love that the ears and spot on his back are a different texture. It was bigger than I expected, but my son loves it. This will be a perfect addition to his Charlie Brown Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: ewilkens

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought this for my child but I would definitely buy again as a gift. Would be ideal as a baby shower gift. Very soft and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my sister. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hiltibrand

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Cute and cuddly. This is one soft little stuffed animal. Gave it as a gift for the snoopy fan in my life and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This plush Snoopy is so cute and so soft. It's the perfect gift my for 2 1/2 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: Using it in our boy’s nursery. Needs to be propped up if for decoration but otherwise cute, very soft! Love the fleece ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi7868

customer_reviews.title: Super soft snoopy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $5 version of this snoopy from Kohl’s while I was waiting for this one to arrive. This one was pricier and I was planning on returning it. However.... the toddler test proved this snoopy to be the best. Super soft, very snuggly, great quality.... my 2 year old will not put it down!!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Haidon

customer_reviews.title: Size is a little off
customer_reviews.text: Everything was pretty much as expected, except the size information is a little off. My is an inch shorter than what the description says. Not a huge deal but other than the one factor I would of given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft toy, classic snoopy look. Nice for a bed decoration or on shelf, not made to be played with roughly.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squeezable.  Bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The wife was worried this would make my seven year old start sucking his thumb again. I knew was just a fan of Peanuts. He loves it, and he did not go back to thumb-sucking.
customer_reviews.author: Derric

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Adorable plush toy my son will treasure it forever. I’m certain it’ll be a stuffed animal he will love always.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha N

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in case the original got damaged. The original is very loved. We love this one almost as much but he knows the difference and is called imposter Snoopy. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: So soft. The perfect size too
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old. She loves it. My 6 month old loves to play with it as well. So we are learning about sharing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and sweet. Bought to use as an accessory to a Charlie Brown costume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for very little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these to each of my newborn grandkids. Perfect side and softness and they both love him!
customer_reviews.author: Choir Director

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: This Snoopy is super soft. Perfect for my son to be Charlie Brown with.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyBuys

customer_reviews.title: He’s to cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love him! He’s cuddly and not to big not to small - he’s soft and he’s always happy
customer_reviews.author: Annie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent for the value for money. My niece loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it!! Very well made, so soft and cuddly!! She loves her Snoopy!! Prrfect buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had this Snoopy since he was a puppy. Great quality and construction

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my Fiance who loves snoopy! Great stuffed snoopy.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable snoopy
customer_reviews.text: It's Snoopy yay. So cute and soft. Got it for my friends grandbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McKelvy

customer_reviews.title: Safe for babies
customer_reviews.text: Nothing seems to be detachable so I sent Snoopy to my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: I don't care if I'm 49!
customer_reviews.text: This super plush Snoopy is simply delicious. He's adorable, well made and soft like a little lamb. Perfect for snuggling. Yes, I said snuggling! I don't care if I'm 49... I still love Snoopy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pellicone

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Three year old LOVES! Super soft n snuggly. Really happy that we got him for her.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves him
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter takes Snoopy everywhere so job done

customer_reviews.title: This is the genuine Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: Snoopy was vacuum packed and arrived quickly, safely and on time. Once removed from the package, he is SO soft. I am well pleased since this is a birthday gift for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: So soft...perfect for a snuggle puppy!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Unique. Will purchase other stuffed animals from here. Excellent quality

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy makes smiles
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this Snoopy and that makes this the best purchase ever.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: beautiful snoopy doll,but the only thing is a little too small,I wish the doll is a little bigger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Snoopy. Like the ones sold in the Hallmark store.

customer_reviews.title: Official Peanuts tags on it

customer_reviews.text: My son loved this snoopy. He’s very soft and cuddly.

customer_reviews.text: He is beautiful and squishy. Plush and beautiful quality. He was a gift and much loved

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I gave it to my son and he can’t get rid of it. Very cute too

customer_reviews.title: It’s very soft!
customer_reviews.text: this is a perfect stuffed animal it comes the same as seen in the photo, it is very soft I gave this stuffed toy to my niece and she loved it, she sleeps with it every night.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Darling and Soft! Very pleased with the quality of materials and workmanship, especially at this price. Cute snoopy face, other snoopy faces when comparison shopping looked strange.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. The little girl I gave it to absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Adorable. The little girl I gave it to absolutely loves it and cuddles it all the time.

customer_reviews.text: When I saw this snoopy plush toy I just fell in love with it. I gave it as a gift to an adult friend of mine and she loved it as well. It is very soft an cuddly. I highly recommend it. It is fun for any age.

product_meta.title: Lambs & Ivy Snoopy Plush
product_meta.description: Our favorite canine, Snoopy, comes to life in this soft cozy plush. He sits a t 10.25 inches tall and is made of polyester fabric. Snoopy coordinates with several Lambs & Ivy collections including My Little Snoopy and Snoopy Sports. He will surely delight your little one and will be a favorite pal for years to come. Care Instructions: Machine wash in gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Imported.
feature_bullets: Our favorite canine, Snoopy, comes to life in this soft cozy plush.
He sits a t 10.25 inches tall and is made of polyester fabric.
Care Instructions: Machine wash in gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Imported.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars740 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
